text: James Bell (born 30 March 1866) was a Scottish footballer. ==Career== Bell played club football for Dumbarton, Mauchline, Celtic, Hurlford and Kilmarnock. ==Honours== ;Dumbarton * Dumbartonshire Cup: Winners 1888-1889 * Greenock Charity Cup: Runners Up 1888–89 * 1 representative cap for Dumbartonshire in 1889. ==References== Category:1866 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Kilmarnock F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Year of death missing Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: James Bell (footballer, born 1866)
